values:
Man, I feel like making a song today. Or at least recording some stuff.  I've got a few drumming parts that I can put together with my guitar to make some good sounds. I'll proably do it later on today...
I really need to start writing some lyrics for some stuff I've already recorded. Got it on my comp, just haven't done much with it. But I'm sure I can make it sound good in a little while.
Anyways, I've had some time to write up a little ditty on my guitar, sounds good but hell, I think anything I write sounds good.... just goes to show how egotistical I am, oh well.

Heh, I gotta go post up some flyers around town to see if I can intrest some people.

Shoot dude, sick with the flu. Man, I've heard talk about my school shutting down for it, and they really should with over 300 people absent with the SAME sickness, oh well.
Hey, I've had some fun e-mailin' my Represenitive and Senator. A lot of fun, telling them to support the U.N. bill on Global Warming, and to protect ANWR. Too bad I only got generic replies. Meh, oh well, I won't die. I just hope both of them actually take what I have said into recognition.

Hopefully I can take a step towards getting a job sometime soon, but hell, who knows if that will happen. I just need some damn money to get to Further Confusion next year, or maybe I might just get a Line6 VettaII head....

Damn dude, I'm Ok I guess. Shit, I've been having too much fun and you all know it. You know you're having too much fun when you make a punk version of "Do-Re-Mi". Fuck, It's all for good times though. Heh, I wish I could just hit this Freshman in the face, he hit me, but fuck dude, goes against my ethics, so I guess I'll just do what I do about most other things in our country, piss and moan until something changes. I'm hoping I get a chance to go to a protest sometime soon, but who the hell knows if that will happen. Meh, If I don't, I'll just start one here, and most of you know I fucking will.
Meh, I'm also thinking about doing my mohawk again:


That would be fun!
Heh, I just want to get some fucking rest right now, that and some Pepsi!
